definition: Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
see 詹姆斯·高斯林[Zhan1 mu3 si1 · Gao1 si1 lin2]
pinyin: Zhan1 mu3 si1 · Ge1 shi4 lin2

sentences.english: And this is true not only of the details, but also of the most essential elements of Scholasticism.
sentences.chinese: 這是真正的不僅是細節，而且最重要的要素士林。

sentences.english: Jiantan, the passenger to Shilin night market, please exit by exit one.
sentences.chinese: 劍潭，往士林夜市的旅客，請於一號出口出站。

sentences.english: One night in Shihlin Night Market (Taipei).
sentences.chinese: 一晚在臺北士林夜市拍攝的。

sentences.english: Scholasticism is a term used to designate both a method and a system.
sentences.chinese: 士林是一個長遠的用於指定既是一種方法和制度。

sentences.english: Pearl power, Vaseline, color power, white mineral oil.
sentences.chinese: 珍珠粉，凡士林，彩粉，石臘油。

sentences.english: Sandra:The west one goes to Jiantan Park, around the Shilin Official Residence.
sentences.chinese: 西側這條會通往劍潭公園，到士林官邸那裏。

sentences.english: Please go to this address in Shihlin.
sentences.chinese: 請到士林區的這個地址。

sentences.english: Bull; Vaseline is a very efficient lubricator .
sentences.chinese: 凡士林是一種很有效的潤滑劑。

sentences.english: With this minimal capital, I can run a small curbside food stand in Shihlin area.
sentences.chinese: 用這點小本錢，我可以在士林擺個小喫攤。

sentences.english: If we start early, do we have some time for Shi-Lin night market too?
sentences.chinese: 要是我們早點出發，還能有時間去士林夜市嗎？

sentences.english: The term scholasticism then began to be used in a derogatory sense.
sentences.chinese: 任期士林，然後開始用在一個帶有貶義色彩的意識。

sentences.english: Our modern society continues to use petroleum jelly as a skin ointment.
sentences.chinese: 現代社會還在使用凡士林作爲皮膚軟膏。

sentences.english: It's the wrinkle in the bedsheet, the sand in the vaseline.
sentences.chinese: 它的皺紋在處子，沙子凡士林。

sentences.english: Also, use petroleum jelly or lip moisturizer for your lips.
sentences.chinese: 還有塗凡士林或護脣膏來保護你的嘴脣。

definition: all levels of society/the imperial court and the ordinary people
famous scholar/worthy/celebrity, esp. distinguished literary person having no official post
land-owning class, esp. during Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties 魏晉南北朝|魏晋南北朝
Imperial College of Supreme Learning, established in 124 BC, and the highest educational institute in ancient China until the Sui Dynasty
